definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The style was hurried, the tone intemperate .
sentences.chinese: 匆促的筆調，放縱的語氣。

sentences.english: Tune in tomorrow for her Top 10 Cons of Virginity
sentences.chinese: 文字筆調上接她的《童貞的十大壞處》。

sentences.english: The editor would take a theme and embroider upon it with drollery.
sentences.chinese: 編輯會將一篇文章，以調侃式的幽默筆調加以渲染。

sentences.english: She answered his letter in such wise that she seemed more of less betwixt and between.
sentences.chinese: 她給他的覆信寫的多少似乎帶有摸棱兩可的筆調。

sentences.english: I feel heavy too, because I must write composition in a heavy style.
sentences.chinese: 我的心情也不很舒暢，因爲我要用沉重的筆調寫作文。

sentences.english: This book sentimentalizes the suffering of the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 這本書以柔懦的筆調渲染了殘疾人的痛苦。

sentences.english: Style fresh, beauty of language, metrical sense is strong, article is a good splendid text.
sentences.chinese: 筆調清新，語言優美，韻律感強，是一篇不錯的美文。

sentences.english: He wrote many books on science in a popular style.
sentences.chinese: 他用通俗的筆調寫了許多科學讀物。

sentences.english: Lu Xun writes with a leisurely pace.
sentences.chinese: 魯迅以一種悠閒的筆調進行寫作。

sentences.english: The bible exclusively rejoices in the birth of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 聖經也用特別喜樂的筆調描寫耶穌的誕生。
